nodes.text: Neskar was a planet located in a star system with at least one sun and orbited by at least 3 moons. From space, Neskar was banded with streaks of red and purple. Neskar Station, a space station that hosted battle-racing, was situated in orbit of Neskar. Shortly after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, Rebel Alliance members Lando Calrissian and Chewbacca flew the Millennium Falcon past Neskar to meet the racer Sebulba, an informant who possessed details regarding pirates that were robbing rebel supply lines.
Neskar appeared in "A Race for Answers," a comic story written by Ian Flynn, illustrated by Tony Fleecs, and published by IDW Publishing in Star Wars Adventures 23 on July 3, 2019.
